title: Repeat: Jeff Goldblum
description: Samantha Bee sits down with THE Jeff Goldblum to talk about returning to Jurassic Park, becoming a Prada model, moonlighting as a kids piano teacher, making ice cream and the beauty of tiny things. Original release date: March 1, 2022.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee & Earwolf)
